title: WTB: T206 Frank Isbell or Bob Unglaub
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Frank Isbell or Bob Unglaub
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
This is sort of a strang request but I have finally after years of selling/trading every card from the t205, t206, & t207 sets (because I never really cared for them to be honest) I have decided I was gonna slowly put these 3 sets together. This is where it gets wierd, I have decided I was going to do them alphabetically and each year just work on one letter of the alphabet at a time (this way it won't impact my other buying all that much).

As this year is almost over I decided I would go for one of the easy letters. Anyways these two players represent letters with only one card each. So if you have a mid-grade T206 card of Frank Isbell or Bob Unglaub I am interested, only request is that there be no writing, paper loss, etc on them. Any back is fine, but I would prefer tougher backs if given the choice.

Anyways, thanks for any help, and I am sorry for being a little strange.

-Rhett Yeakley
